directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.  Lightly spray a 13 x 9-inch baking pan with non-stick cooking spray.  Cut sausage into 1/2" cubes.  Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
Spread mixture evenly in prepared pan.  Bake 40-45 minutes or until lightly browned.  Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) package Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage
1 (20 ounce) package refrigerated shredded hash brown potatoes
title: Cheesy Potatoes with Smoked Sausage
